Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up; Quiet; Easy To Use; Fast Operation; Reliable
This is an excellent printer for the price. I am amazed at how nice it prints. Machine was easy to setup. Printer is wired to my desktop and wireless to my iPad. Prints beautifully! The only problem I encountered was printing photos. Once the correct paper quality is selected, there were no issues. I have always had good luck with HP products and the company has good customer support as well. In today's economy customer service and a great product means a lot. Thanks

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: It's a great mid-sized printer, but...
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy setup plus great features and value for the price.
Cons: Noisy clunky sounds during printer head parking.
I like this printer because it has a 100 sheet capacity and prints double sided without the operator having to manually turn the paper over. This is a great feature especially when printing from three rooms away. It was very easy to set up using the graphic setup instruction sheet, and it connected easily to my wireless home network modem. Installation of the software on each of my family's four laptops was quick and easy, and each printer interfaced with the printer via wireless connection without any issues or troubleshooting. I have a 2300 sqaure foot 2-storey house, and I can print from any room. I have only had the printer for about a week, but the ink con ... sumption seems very low; I am sitll using the starter ink cartridges that came with it.
But...It seems to me that the printer is a bit slow to start printing, and the printer makes loud clunky sounds when the printer head parks at the end of every printing job. These two downers are a little bit annoying, but they don't affect the printer's performance at all. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Replaced an HP All-in-One I have had since 2003 after it finally bit the dust. The Officejet 6500A Plus clearly shows technology has changed a lot in the past 8 years. Set it up on my home network with no issue. The printer and the CD for the computer both walked me through steps to get it working. Print speed in draft mode is amazing, the kids were suprised to see how fast a printer can print. Contrary to some of the other reviews, I think we were close to seeing 32 ppm in this mode (school report black text, space and a half between lines). The ease of use on the control panel is fantastic. There is no learning curve which is great since there are so many different modes you can use this printer in. Tried AirPrint from my iPhone and it just worked (the phone found the printer, I picked i ... t on a phone menu, and printed) ... I did not even set anything up! Still not sure how this works but, wow! I do have the hp ePrint service app on the phone that I installed a few months ago. I typically do not write reviews on websites but found this experience so good I thought I should share. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Cons: longevity and paper handling - NOT very good
I have the precursor to this printer, the J6450. It's lasted just over 14 months, probably 900 pages and about 75-100 4x6 photos. Currently, the printer will attempt to print and display a "general error" error message. HP tech support says it's out of warranty, bring it into the authorized service center, but it's not very likely that I would get it fixed for less than $100. I DO like honest tech support people.
In the 13.5 months it was working well, it was a pretty solid printer. Text was crisp if you used good paper. Photos were fair on the high quality mode. The sheet feeder for the copier is only good for the first page, after that it will skew pages to the right and eventually either tear or jam the originals.
N ... ormal printing works well. Forget about the "duplex" option. It will take forever and eventually jam. The photo paper feed works ok, but it's very sensetive to how you align the stack of photo paper. I'd suggest only stacking less than 5 blank photo stock pages at a time.
One time I tried to print some card stock thru this. The output skewed left on each sheet. I gave up on that attempt. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Cons: Unreliable; Streaks; Default black hard to set; Uses lots of ink; Jams Easily; Can't customize paper sze; Noisy; Travels on the table; Poor contrast
Top Ten Plus Reasons To Leave This In The Store- 1. HP offers a limited menu for paper sizes, many Japanese items, and yet I get "invalid paper size" when I print the standard craft store greeting card sizes. It won't print them. 2 hr phone call to HP, three steps up on the tech support, to learn no HP offers the option to customize your paper size. Lexmark 901 does!
2.I copied the same color photo on this and the Lexmark I traded for this one. HP didn't pick up pastel colors and the contrasts weren't as subtle.
3. Lexmark does 510 black text sheets with a $4.95 cartridge. HP can't compare.
4. Lexmark h ... as 5 yr warranty. HP only 1.
5. Color copies streaked. It took wasting 3 sheets of paper and ink so it wouldn't streak. this was consistent.
6. Common paper jams. Common feedback on this.
7. It is very noisy and you can't be on the phone near it. Not true with my new Lexmark.
8. Hard to install and remove cartridges. Lexmark has spring tabs you just push and easy removal.
9. It travels on the table when it prints a lot. Lexmark doesn't.
10. The two sided copy was inconsistent.
11. It is larger than the Lexmark I purchased and has more glossy black plastic that shows the dust. Lexmark has more matte black and brushed aluminum colored plastic pieces that hide dust better.
12. It only has one paper tray. Lexmark has option for two. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
I upgraded this printer from HP Officejet 7000 Wide format becuse I wanted to use features like fax, coiper & scanner . This is my fourth HP printer in 8 years and I am glad to say HP products are cool.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up; Quiet
Cons: Unreliable
Twice gave error message paper size mismatch. First time it took tech support over an hour to figure out and tell me how to do a secret factory reset to fix the problem. I saved the instructions and did it a lot faster the second time. Appears to use a lot of ink in spite of claim to save ink. Will not do backprint which our old canon did easily. Not good for Avery labels - wasted several sheets. Cannot recommend this printer at all!

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Owned less than 2 months
Cons: Noisy; Slow Operation
Bought this printer(for my wife and I) along with an Epson Artisan 725(for my teenagers). This printer was easy to set up and connect to a wireless network. It is a little larger than some(but not too big). We got a great price on both printers (sales and trade ins)which is one of the reasons we bought two. It is a little slower than I expected when getting it ready to print, the actual print speed is fairly fast. We have already had some problems with the print quality especially on green colors(cleaned the heads about six times)after doing this the color got better. After the cleanings the inks are now low(cleaning uses a substantial amount of ink). We got rid of a KOD-K all in one print ... er for some of the same reasons(owned about a year and a half) before the printer no longer really had any quality to it. Hoping that some higher capacity cartridges will resolve any issues. It is also a little noisier and busier than I expected(not really an issue as it doesn't bother us). Might return it and get an Epson if issues can't be resolved. It has the potential to be a 4-5 star machine still "too early to tell" expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Now that the equipment is installed and operational, I am very happy with the printer. It has excellent features and the price was very good. However, I found the setup instructions very difficult to follow and essentially had to guess my way through the setup at too many points.
I thought the instructions were unclear and assumed too much pre-knowledge of the equipment and I found the info and instructions regarding the eprint center difficult to locate and use. The icon for the eprinter center didn't work until after I had actually been to the eprint center and made needed adjustments. At one point, I made an adjustment to my router that I mistakenly thought was being asked for and I wound up with several hours of router problems and a $40 fee for technical assistance with the rou ... ter. I also found the set-up with a couple of mobile devices difficult to handle. Very little seemed intuitive or user friendly. The set up was an almost totally frustrating experience.
Without the setup problems, I would have graded my experience with 5 stars but the setup was horrible. Unless the printer blows up tomorrow, however, the printer will still have been worth the aggravation, even the $40 for technical help. It works as advertised and has an excellent set of features and the price was great and I have had good luck with HP products in the past. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: The HP Officejet 6500A is very easy to use. It's a great home-office machine. I had an earlier model of the same product... but it's paper-grabbing-wheels wore down to where it wouldn't feed paper through any more. I liked the design so bought another. I did need to call tech support to get this one set up as my HP computer didn't read the installation CD that came with the printer. But it works well now, and I like the product.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: The features of the HP Officejet 6500 are good. The machine design and operating manual leave a lot to be desired. The manual does not describe the mechanical aspects sufficiently. Documents to be scanned RUN THROUGH the machine instead of being stationary. Tried to scan a business card. Swallowed by the machine cannot figure out how to retrieve it. Printing and scanning slower than, say Dell AIO 926 in the same price renge. Wireless works well. Tech support very good. Overall? Would probably look at something else for a replacement. Hope this helps you. nick77

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Cons: Difficult To Set Up; Touch control panel; Software setup
I owned a HP 6500 printer for 2 years and 8 months. I loved the printer. Then, one day, it decided that the print function was malfunctioning. I could not resolve the issue. So, I bought a new HP 6500. The software and setup changed a lot. The new software was nothing like the old software that I had been used to. Also, the new software offered lots of new options. However, there was no written or "info click" explanation of what the options offered (they were not intuitive). During the setup it asked if I wanted to use the duplexer. I answered YES. After installation setup, it printed both sides by default and I was unable to over-ride that default. Googling on the internet did not provide an answer but othe ... rs had encountered the same problem. Finally, a lengthy phone call to HP support in Zimbavway resulted in uninstalling and then reinstalling while answering the default duplexing question NO. Now it gives me the option to duplex if I so choose. Also, the old model had lots of control panel function keys. the new model has a touch screen and it is much harder to use. expand » « collapse

This machine just does not deliver in the scanning department. I spent 3 hrs with tech using various combinations and could not get a file size that was small enough to easily send and still be readable. I use mine to scann and email contracts and it does not do the job. My 6500, which I thought I was upgrading, is much better at controlling the size. Tech support is a joke. 3 hours and they say this is just the way it is on the new printers! I hope my older model does not go out on me. I guess you really do have to think about "new and inmproved" which is what tech support called it.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: e-mail printing, customer service, speed, quality, setup
Cons: wont print at all if runs out of any color
For the money the printer is great. The e-mail-to-print function was a life-saver when I switched from Windows PC to Mac and couldnt print my resume from the Mac yet. The quality is nice, it prints quickly, setup was really easy on my Mac. I experienced a couple issues: 1) When you run out of any color ink, the printer will not print at all until you replenish all empty cartridges and 2) Print Head would not print out black ink. I called HP customer service and they sent a new print head in the mail and was easy to plug in the new print head.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This all-in-one was purchased toward the end of February of this year, and I was happy with it – though not for the price. It printed in nice colors, printed on both sides just fine, had a cool touch screen (my first for a printer), and was pretty easy to install and use. However, my one and only problem didn’t start until after two months of having it. For some unknown, unexplained reason, my scanner will not work on my computer, a HP TouchSmart IQ504 Desktop PC. I uninstalled and re-installed the printer, and the scanner would work a day or so, but if not in constant use it’s like the scanner gets bored and wanders off or something. I’ve contacted HP, gotten help, but it didn’t amount to anything but wasted time. I downloaded the printer to my cousin’s laptop and it worked fine, so now I ... don’t know what I’m going to do. I have until 2014 before my warranty runs out; nevertheless, I'd recommend this product just make sure you get as much warranty as you can. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: A great printer for small business.
Item.Review:
This is a great little printer for a small business or for personal use. It prints crisp documents as well as clear color prints and photos. Faxes are received on both ends with very clear results although sending faxes is on the slow side but hands and cable free with smooth operation.
I only have two areas of note on this printer. 1, it is noisy and 2, it uses more ink than my previous all-in-one (an HP 6110). However I use the "draft" setting to overcome greater amounts of ink usage and still get great quality documents.
Setup and installation went off without a hitch. Only took about 15 min. max and after testing the system I was up and running. I kept my old HP 6110 as back up just in case but that was not necessary. I had heard this printer took up a lot of space. This ... printer takes up about 1/3 less room than its predecessor. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up
Cons: Noisy; Unreliable; Jams Easily
New in May 2011. Within 8 weeks it began intermittant "paper size mismatch" message [even though all settings were correct for "letter" size], and within days the message appeared at every printing attempt. Hours on phone to India; no solution - he would confer with higher-up tech and call me the next day. Silence. I called again several days later. Philippines this time, and that tech fixed it. Within 30 days it's doing it again, and now there is no tech support telephone number anywhere on HP owners' "help" features. Must be done via computer "chat" with tech who gives a teroubleshooting link of steps to try. If that doesn't solve the problem, you're out of luck as tech has ended session. As if that isn't bad e ... nough, entering product serial number and model number into HP "help" got the response from HP that there is no record of that serial number, and never mind that I've a copy of my online purchase registration for that serial number. Another fluke of this printer is that it [when it worked] would change print size from one page to the next, on its' own whim. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Review: Easy setup, Did not need 2 phone lines as in the 5780 model. WiFi a bit of a problem in setting up but really did not need it for home use. JUst a USB cable, power cord and direct phone line from the wall jack. The printer is noisy but does print very fast and good quality. Can print from the PC or my fax info in the PC. It does not offer a cover page for the faxes. I have a template that I use to fill out, print and fax with the other information. In conclusion this model is a very good upgrade from the 5780 model and was a good value from HP

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: I could return it for a Lexmark that has the quality HP used to deliver.
Cons: See the above Top Ten Plus reasons I returned it..
I ended up returning this HP for a Lexmark that I LOVE! So glad Best Buy has more than just HP.
Top Ten Plus One Reasons I returned this HP 6500 A for Lexmark
1.HP was noisy or more noisier than my 7 yo HP printer despite what they advertised. The Lexmark was so quiet i could stand by it and be on the phone.
2. LEXMARK--CHEAPEST INK ON THE MARKET! $4.95 for 510 pages in black ink.
3. HP travels a lot when it prints. Again, as much or more than my former one.
4. The first few copies streak when printing in color.
5. You can no longer buy any HP that allows you to customize your paper size. I print gree ... ting cards that come in packs of 100 at all major craft retailers. The standard sizes are not listed in the restricted menu that includes many Japanese sizes. You will get an error message that says "invalid paper size." I spent 3 hours with HP tech support. Went up 3 levels. Finally learned there's nothing I can do. Did get sent a second ethernet cable though. I then had 2 I didn't use.
6. It takes 4 steps to PRINT in black. And if you make it your default, you have to go back into printer preferences if you want to COPY in color. They clearly want to sell you more color ink. Lexmark has the grey scale/black option on page one of their printing preferences along with the customize paper size option the way HP used to.
7. Before I exchanged the HP for Lexmark I copied a photo from both. HP contrast was missing subtleties. HP totally missed some pale colors. And as I said, it streaks.
8. HP jammed a lot. I've read other comments on other sites and learned that this is common.
9. Inconsistent in copying on both sides.
10. HP-One year warranty. Lexmark- 5 year.
11. I did a few tests of tech support at Lexmark before buying. So far they have alll been in the US, no out of country support that is hard to understand and hard to be understood. .
Only Pro- easy set up. But so was Lexmark. HP just doesn't deliver the quality anymore. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
I purchased the HP 6550A Plus 710n printer and i have a predominantly a MAC network. I have nothing but problems.
* Wireless IP drops just sitting idle. * Black and White printing mode prints weak but setting it to color prints B&W documents normally. * Printing pictures from a MAC prints with parallel tracks across the picture at 1cm intervals.
Seeing the good reviews I wonder if I was the exception with a lemon. I am working with HP to see if I can resolve my problems or I just dump this printer and get a Canon or something else in the HP line.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Good print quality
Cons: Difficult setup; Flimsy Construction; Inconsistent performance
This product is used in a home office for business and personal. The setup of the product was relatively easy but after repeated attempts still have not been successful in networking or wireless operation. Perfomance is inconsistent. Usually the automatic document feeder works but not always. Sometimes I can generate a print from my computer but not usually. Operation is annoying. It takes 6 touch selections to produce a draft copy (1. Light up screen, 2. 'Copy', 3. 'Settings' 4. 'Quality', 5. 'Draft', 6. Black), plus one more if more than one copy desired. This is with the setup indicating that I always want a draft copy. Construction is questionable. After about 2 weeks o ... f use a piece fell down into the paper tray. It appears to be some kind of sheet feeder and I cannot get it back into place. Overall, I am disappointed in this product. This is my 5th HP printer or all in one purchased over the years. My general impression is that each one has been more poorly designed and constructed and less reliable. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: After bumpy start I found the 1
Item.Review: Ok I have to say it was a rough start when I decided to buy a new printer. I originally went to walmart and bout the 4500 wireless, got it home and couldnt get it to connect from the printer to the computer. I just started a new business and was in desperate need of a printer and fax. I was going to exchange it but found a coupon in my email for 40 bucks off at hp online. So I figured why not save some money. So after looking online I that the 6500a model was on sale plus I got the coupon also so I was getting a "better" printer for cheaper. I got it and opened it and for 5 hours could not get it to read the printhead. I was on the phone with Tech support for about an hour. They were gonna send a new printhead but I wasnt happy with that because I was sure it was a defective printer and I ... couldnt wait any longer. Finally he got back on the phone and said it was the whole printer and they would ship me a new 1 which I recieved the next morning. But when it got there I realized it wasnt wireless. So I ended up having to return it and repurchase the 6500a wireless. I LOVE this printer. I was scared from all the reviews but I have had no problems. It was fairly easy setup(it did alot of the wireless set up itself) and I was printing and faxing in 20 mins. It was def worth the trouble I went thru!!! I would recommend this printer Lets just hope I dont take that back in a few months lol expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

For the price the printer does everything that I need and much more. There are more expensive printers on the market, but this is an above average printer for a home office.

But to date this printer seems to deliver everything I have been searching for. Having a wireless setup has helped me a great deal in the overall layout of my home office.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Straight out of the box, setup was smooth as silk. Just follow the directions on the very large printout and you'll be ready to print in 30 minutes. Printing is so quiet that I find myself double checking to be sure a page was printed. The quality is fantastic and the speed is excellent. The copier and fax work great. The sleek look is an added bonus. If you want a great all-in-one with laser quality output but without the price of a laser printer... HP is it!

I purchased this printer because I liked the wireless features and more with my officejet 6480 and had put a lot of hours on it the last 2 1/2 years. It was very easy to set it up wireless with my cradlepoint router. Had 4 computers set up. I have had the HP officejet 6500A plus nearly a month and it is still not set up wirelessly. The printer recognizes the ssid name of the router but cannot pick up the id 192.169.0.???. I've tried everything I know short or having tech support come to my home at a higher cost than I paid for the printer to set it up again. I will say except for that serious issue everything else wor ... ks great. expand » « collapse

The scan, fax, copy, print and wireless functions all work like they are supposed to. We have used it moderately and so far no problems. Good clean printing, no paper feed issues. I can't say anything about customer service because we have not had to use them. There could be a better more detailed users manual with the printer. ... There may be one available for download from the HP website. So far we are very pleased with this printer. expand » « collapse

I only printed 2 pictures so far and they were not as good as on my old HP.I think this is made primarily for documents, not pics. I've tried double-sided printing and it came out great. You really do get a great value with all ... the features this printer offers.You can send something from your cell right to the printer, which is pretty cool. It's not hard to set up at all. Item.Review: I have had my new printer for a couple of weeks. The setup was simple, either the computer guided you through it or it was done automatically. The AirPrint feature was a breeze to use. I just pressed print on my iPad and there it went. The scanner does a great job on scanning documents clearly. Two sided printing is a useful feature. Making multiple page copies was easy with the auto document feeder. Haven't used all the features yet, but so far no difficulties. It's not the quietest or fastest printer ever, and it shakes my desk a lot when it prints, but those things are not a concern for me. It is a big upgrade from my old Brother printer.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Followed the instructions to set up printer, fax, and network connections. Worked perfectly. Great printer, does photos up to 8-1/2 to 11 very well too. Great price on everything!

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
I had an Officejet 7590 that I used for several years and just LOVED! Then, my condo building contracted with our cable provider to put a cable modem in every unit. Great news... But could't use the printer as part of my wireless network.
So, I ordered this all-in-one. WOW! Easy to set up, great results, what more could I want? My only concern is the ink cartridges are little soft plastic things - not like those heavy duty hard commercial-looking things that came with my old printer. I hope these are just as good and dependable as those were...

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This printer, added to my HP black and white laser printer, completes my home system, with everything I might possibly need at home. The setup (by my tech savvy son) was painless, and I now have the capability to print from my laptop, and wonder of wonders...even my iTouch. Color was far down on my list of necessities, but now that I have it, it's great to use. It's much slower than I'm used to (with high speed everything in my office) but for a home machine, it's not a problem. For the price, I'd definitely recommend this printer.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Cons: Not owning one!

I hooked up a dedicated phone line to it and I use it to print documents, photos. Scan documents or pictures to my computer and fax from both my computer and from the unit itself! Love it! Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Got this printer 7 months ago. I keep printer at home for convenience and don't use it much. I printed about 82 pages. Today I was trying to print and the quality was very poor. I couldn't even read the document. Tried cleaning the ink via automatic option on the printer option, couple of times. Quality was still bad. I printed the Print Status Report and that's where it showed me how many pages I have printed so far. It also showed that the ink was under warranty till 1/8/2013. I called HP customer service/tech support. A guy name Steve from India answered the phone. After hearing my complaint, he told me that the cartridges that come with the printer are "starter cartridges", not sure what it means. He said those were supposed to print only 40 to 50 pages. He advises me to buy new cartri ... dges and that he could give me the best deal on the phone. I said ok. While he was taking my order, I checked the printer information online at shopping.hp.com. It said that in the cartridges that come with the printer are suppose to print 420 pages (black) and 300 pages (color). I mentioned to him but he kept emphasizing that the website was wrong and the cartridges are only supposed to print 40 to 50 pages.
This may be my first experience where customer service told me that their website was wrong. Also, I was expecting HP to honor the warranty that came with the printer (1 yr) and ink (18 months).
I had a Brother printer for about 6 years. I did not have any printer quality issue with it. I used that printer occasionally as well. Like there were months where I did not use the printer, but after printing a page or two, it used to print just fine. HP had disappointed me today in terms of the quality of the product and the customer service. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Buyer beware - it quite simply doesn't work well
Item.Review:
Cons: Very unreliable
This printer seemed to be a good balance of price and value; I wanted something that would work reliably and consistently.
The printer was easy to set up - I use a mac.
It constantly drops its wireless connection, lots of problems with scanning. The help pages are no use. The printer utility quits unexpectedly, the printer disappears from the network, and when scanning does work it is very slow and often fails. All my software, o/s, router etc are up to date, and I am tech savvy.
I wish I had kept the box so I could return it; will probably try that anyway.
I am never buying an HP printer again.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Set up was very easy, print speed not there.
Item.Review:
Pros: Set up
Cons: Print speed
Syncing with all computers on our network was a breeze. Desktop, laptops,tablets and even smartphones were ready to print in no time. Setting up the email address for faxing was flawless. Then came the printing. When sending a print job to the printer it would sometimes take 1-2 mins. to start printing. When it started printing it would print one line and then pause for about 30 secs. and then print another line or two and pause again. Wi-fi signal was excellent. Still troubleshooting to no avail. Will probably return when I get the chance.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Review:

Cons: Incompatible papers
Overall, great for printing on text and photo paper. However, will not print on HP brochure paper. That is a downfall.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:

I bought this printer a couple of days before Christmas. It was on sale for $99.99. My wife uses it with her laptop. She had to plug her laptop in to our older printer in order to make it work. She loves the Wi-Fi feature on this new HP printer. She says it's like magic being able to print from anywhere. It was very easy to setup.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I'm only a week into using this printer so my comments are based on easy setup and function. I've printed in black & white and color, scanned in both and printed an envelope as well as a small shipping label, all without problems. I'm really amazed at how much this unit does for such a low cost. I participated in an online forum but felt that HP didn't go beyond what was in the manual and I wanted to print a half sheet of a mini shipping label, but I went ahead and did it anyway and it printed flawlessly and safely.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:

I like the wireless feature and overall a good printer. Had a photosmart before and that had more features for doing photos. Feel this one is limited for photos or I just haven't learned the printer. The instruction booklet has limited info on finding how to do different jobs. Could use more directions on use.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This is what I was after. Perfect printer with everything I wanted. The document feeder is what I needed. No need to scan 1 paper at a time. Wireless was easy to set-up.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: prints direct from iPad
Cons: can't get email printing to work
Fnctionally this printer is great. Easy to set up and easy to use. It even can print in duplex function and allows for printing straight from your iPad. It wirelessly hooks up so it's easy to print from any computer on your network. It scans, send faxes, prints in color. It fits in well in my office and is pretty sleek considering how much that it can do. Not sure what else you could possibly want. This is certainly not the fastest printer, so if you are a high volume printer, you may want to consider something different, but for the average home user, you will be just fine.
HP has a function where you can set -up an email address for you printer that would allow you to print to the computer from anyw ... here just by emailing the document to that address. This function has not yet worked for me, but sounds great in theory. That is the only downfall that I've seen to this printer. If I can ever get that function to work, I'll be beyond content. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Review:
Pros: lot's of features, double-side printing, sleek look
Cons: wireless connectivity
The features on this printer are nice however the wireless connectivity is very poor even if machine is close to the router (our was less than 6 feet) Many documents were sent to printer and were not printed. Once we connected the printer to the router via cable all problems disappeared. Nice sleek look, nice features. Still a good value machine.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Buy on the Officeject 6500A Plus
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Fast Operation; Reliable; Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up
I looked at a number of options before selecting this one. I did research on CNET, Retrevo, and PC World. Ultimately, it came down to a reasonable, albeit sale price, and HP's reputation for cost-per-page savings.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
I've owned this printer just long enough for my warranty to be expired. All the features sounded great when I bought it, but now I'm having second thoughts. Don't get me wrong, in some ways this printer is great, but in others it falls short. Here are some key points that I feel are worth sharing:
1. e-print feature - I have to say hands down this is the number one reason I bought this printer. When this function works right, it is great. We have our printer upstairs, but do a lot of 'work' from our laptops downstairs. It's nice not to have to take the laptops up with us when we need something printed. Unfortunately, it only seems to print when the computer is not in 'sleep' mode. If it's been used recently and still 'awake' the feature works great. I use an 8500 e-print at work tha ... t doesn't require this, so I'm not sure if it's a setting or an actual problem with the printer, but it's a pain nonetheless. FEATURE RATING: FAIL
2. Duplex printing - this is probably the second reason I chose this printer. I was sick and tired of having to use a ton of paper or manually flip the pages if I wanted to print on both sides (which I had to do with the Lexmark printer this replaced). This feature worked great for the better part of a year, but now I can't even use it - it literally jams on every page. FEATURE RATING: FAIL
3. Color printing - for what I print, I had to have a color printer. I have no complaints about the color quality or picture resolution. For printing color images/documents this product really delivers. FEATURE RATING: PASS
4. Ink cartridge longevity - this is another key reason I picked this particular printer. The old Lexmark was so expensive to buy short-lived cartridges that it was almost the same price to give that printer away and buy this one than it would have been to buy replacement cartridges for the old printer - and its extra capacity cartridges didn't even match the basic cartridges for this one. I do recommend passing on the standard cartri ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Printing is good. Won't stay connected to network.
Item.Review:
Pros: ????????
Cons: Network connection. What has happened to HP?
Working with customer service at HP is impossible. Where do these people live? It appears from my Google searches that numerous other consumers are having the same issue. I would love a replacement but do not have the spare time to deal with this headache.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Nice printer. Very easy to set up and user friendly. I have yet to conquer how to switch between color and B&W printing. Its a little on the large side for desktop printers but great value and good perfomance so far.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Good quality prints and photos. Goes in to sleep mode too often which is a re pain. If you have to go to the other end of the house to turn it on every time you want to use it then what good is the "wireless".

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:

I love my new printer. Once I get some of the High features down pat, it is on.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Worst HP Printer I ever had
Item.Review: Setup was a breeze and worked fine printing, faxing and coping. Don't print much but it used way to much ink. Or rather the ink cartridges were to small for the price. A few months back went to print something and the paper would not feed into the printer right. The drop down wheel and gear assembly that starts the paper into the printer had stripped a gear and would not push the paper into the printer to start it. Took it to a shop to see if I could get it repaired and they said they couldn't get the parts to fix it. Now I have a Fax and Copy machine without a print option. I doubt I ran 50 pages through this printer. I've had two previous HP printers, the last being the 722 and they were used quite a bit with years of service until they just plain wore out.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Large Footprint
Set up was easy on my wireless connection. Now I can print from the living room while watching TV. Touch screen is easy to use. After going through 3 printers in the last 2 years...I am most satisfied with this one.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This printer is definitely in all in one. I love that I can send my pics from my smartphone to the printer, I love the fun apps that I can print. It has a touch screen that is pretty cool, but a little hard to use unless you have small fingers. The prints come out very nice and the ink cartridges are individual, which makes replacing a little cheaper. Great value

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Fast Operation; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
If you are technologically challenged,this is the all in one for you. I can't believe how easy it was to setup and use. I have used all of the features repeatedly in the 2 weeks I've had it and never had a problem.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I bought this for my home office after retiring a HP 8500 all-in-one. It took me 5 hours to set up and be on the phone with HP tech support to get it to work. Turns out you need to uninstall the old printer software before installing this software but the instructions do not tell you this. This printer is extremely slow and makes a loud scraping noise when the carriage returns on scanning and copying mode. The store said it is not broken, that's the way it is built. Can't have that! I packed it up the next day and returned it for a HP 8600 Pro which is super fast. Don't waste your money on this 6500 printer no matter how low priced it is.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: This printer is not for You
Item.Review:
Pros: I liked the look and the potential
Cons: Never able to use the printer on a network.
I'm a religous HP calculator, computer and printer user. This printer is by far their worst product ever! Can't be installed on a LAN, eprint setup is a joke. Nothing ever works twice. HP support was responsive, but still never fixed the problems.
This is going in the trash can. I would hate to sell this to another person and cause them the same frustration. HP should do the same before it ruins its reputation.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I was tired of buying printers that cost less than the replacement ink, so I splurged! $85 for this all-in-one is unbelieveable! Only had it a week but used most the functions and it's so easy to set up the wireless and use. Just hope it continues.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Setup
Before I bought this printer I called HP and talked to a customer service rep. This is what he recomended for me, and he said he owns this module as well. I set this printer up in about 15 minutes. It took longer to get all the plastic and tape off the printer than anything else. Setting up the network part was very easy and works on all my computers, Ipad2 and Ipod touch. I recommend this printer to anyone looking for an all-in one.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I purchased this printer at my local Best Buy because it was on sale for $99.99 and I have been wanting a printer for a while. I got the printer home and started the set up for it. Installing it wireless to my 3 computers was super easy!! Being able to use it to print from my computers was easy as well. What was difficult about it was getting it set up and registered to use the ePrint services. That is the main reason I purchased it because of the ePrint apps available. I have young children and being able to just print a coloring page from the printer was very nice. HOWEVER, 3 days and 4 hours of phone calls later, it was finally able to do the ePrint apps. I do really appreciate the HP tech support walking me through each and everything that it could be. Only to find out it was something ... in MY router that needed changed. A quick call to my ISP and we were in business. I LOVE my HP printer and would definitely recommend it to EVERYONE!!!! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: I had to kick my Lexmark to the curb!
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Use; Reliable
Cons: Slow Operation; Hard Setup; Noisy
I am amazed at how long the ink lasts. This was the primary reason that I got rid of my Lexmark. I live in Lexington, KY and I really wanted to support a local company. But, every Lexmark I have owned just drinks ink! Let's face it ink is far to expensive. This HP sips ink and prints beautifully. A huge plus! Another feature I love is that I can print from my iPhone easily. Even from out of the country!
A con I would have is it is a little slow starting a document and it makes a lot of noise before and after a print job. It makes me wonder what the heck it's doing? Whiring, clicking and clacking.
Print quality and speed are great.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Fast Operation; Great Print Quality
Cons: A little noiser
Great printer. Setup was easy, slightly bulky and noiser than my previous printer. I love the 2 sided printing. It pulls the paper back after it prints first side. Even though it is wi-fi, I couldnt get rid of the wires due to fax. It has smart fax, so it will pick up fax when needed and lets the call go to voice message otherwise. Draft printing is extermely fast. It actually shoots the paper out. Couple of times I noticed paper thrown about 2-3 feet away. I would definitely recommend this printer.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: I'm glad I went back to HP
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Easy To Use; Great Print Quality; Fast Operation; Reliable; Quiet
Sofar the set up was easy and it works very good. I had a HP before and I am glad I went back.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Step up fr last HP printer
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Operation; Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
Cons: Computer connection; Noisy
The printer set-up quickly & easily. My problem was getting the computer to connect to the printer. I called HP when I ran out of ideas. It took a bit to get the fax connected, also, but once done, works great. I really love the speed of copying. I have little to medium size fingers & I find the tip of an eraser or a stylus helps when having to make choices on the pad. I wouldn't mind having it made of another type of material that doesn't act like a magnet to dust & shows fingerprints/smudges. I'm glad I upgraded.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I've been a long time fan of HP printers, but this one is a lemon. I'm on my second one (after unexplained problems with the first one - which I returned). The wireless is difficult to set up, and for whatever reason the printer goes into sleep mode and won't turn back on. I'm constantly required to unplug and reset the printer to get it to turn back on each time I print. The print quality itself is good, but this printer is junk. Well below my expectations of an HP product.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I bought it on sale and feel terrific about the value. My old printer is an HP and still works well after 7 years, however, I needed to upgrade to wireless for the new computer. The features are just right and the 2 sided print/copy feature works just as it should. It arrived in perfect condition and was easy to set up. I love the AirPrint and ePrint features. The apps might be unnecessary. I have to figure out how to cancel a test subscription to a recipe app that prints automatically each day. I cannot testify to the ink consumption rate yet as I have only had it for a week.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Quiet; Great Print Quality; Fast Operation; Compact Design
Love this printer! It's sleak design and touch screen operation are great. Easy connection to our network. Scans documents easily. Copies are clear. Great printer for under $100. Would definately recommend it to others.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Set up was easy. Worked first time from both Linux and Windows. No jams with the printer or the document feeder/scanner so far.
Cons: The duplex printing takes a VERY long time. After 71 pages of printing the ink reserve is down to about 80% in all colors & black. Will not connect wired and wireless at the same time. Web scan to .pdf says click button to download, but no button is provided. The interface appears to have MAJOR browser dependencies. Did not work at all with Chrome. Firefox received partial pages.
Unknown: Have not used FAX.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy wireless setup.
Cons: Noisy startup and use.
I bought the HP printer an the advice from the store clerk. Yeah, I know I know, but wait, I'm really happy with it! I read many reviews and I'd decided on a Brother, but after looking at the two comparable models, went with the HP, even though I had decided against it based on reviews that said it was "fragile" and easy to break. Since that was the problem with the Dell I was replacing, I was wary. But looking closely at the two printers, the HP actually felt more robust than the Brother, certainly more than my Dell. I hooked up my laptop, my work laptop, my PC, and my iPhone all in that night after bringing it home. Very easy wireless setup. Warning, if it seems that the computer cannot find the printer on your network ... , reboot your computer. Had to do that with both my PC and work laptop, but not with my Mac, go figure. I've used it for copying, scanning, and printing and could not be happier with the results. Have not used the fax as I have no need of that. All in all I'm a happy camper and glad to have finally gone wireless. Oh, yeah, and it was on sale - $99!! Bargain! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Fast Operation; Easy To Use; Great Print Quality; Compact Design; Reliable
Cons: Noisy
One of the easiest to set up and works great. Haven't had any problems so far. HP is always very helpful when I do have a problem

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: I returned 3 of these with defects
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Fast Operation; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Unreliable
I owned a Deskjet 6000 and was very happy with it. I was told that the 6500 is an all-in-one version of the same printer. The 6500 was very easy to install and operate. It is also quick (though it has an interim drying time after printing one side in auto duplex)and flexible.I was excited by the printer. Unfortunately the first one I had would not print correct margins (even from Word documents(.docx)). HP technical help could not resolve this and finally said it was my software (Word!)The second printer didn't have this problem but (a) it would not update to the latest firmware and software as determined by HP technical support and none of their many fixes made a difference(b) when printing text and graphics, ... I got fine dark lines in the solid color areas that were perpendicular to the feed direction. HP said it was my photos but the same files printed well on a different printer (tried this at Staples and at home). The third printer had the same lines across the photos-only more of them and much worse. I spent hours on the phone with HP technical help.They tried hard to be helpful but when resolution was not easy, the answer inevitably was--it is your system not the printer. I took all three back. I'm disapointed because this printer would be great-if it worked and did so reliably. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Speed and convenience.
Cons: A little bulky in size.
I purchased this printer for a home office to replace an older model. I like the wireless feature which permits printing from any computer on my home network. I also like that it prints muti page documents much faster and two sided without any paper handling.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Reasonable Price
Cons: Paper Jam, Slow Screen
I had bought this printer due to other reviews and being on sale. My review is just basically about the intial setup. The program would not load up onto my laptop. It kept freezing on my computer. When I turned on the printer the touch screen would pause and was real slow. When I got to the step for test print. The printer pulled the paper through and it would wrinkle, jam, and not print. I kept getting the wrong paper message on the printer screen which I could not understand. Maybe I just happen to get a defective printer but it looks very nice. Im returning it today to try another printer.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
Cons: Noisy
I am not a techie so setting up any machine is a challenge to me. On the plus side...this was easy. Wireless setup went off without a hitch. Printing is fast. Scanning is flexible and easy. Have not set up the fax as I seldom if evry use it.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: It doesn't get any better than HP
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Compact Design; Quiet; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Fast Operation; Easy To Use
Really like this printer. I also use it as a fax I rate it 11+

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This printer is easy to install and set up. It holds a good amount of paper and has all the functions I would ever need. It has a sleek, simple look which is easy to clean and use. The touchpad is a definite plus which is very user friendly. It's a great product.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Reliable; Compact Design; Quiet; Easy To Set Up; Fast Operation; Easy To Use
I love this printer!!! The quality is awesome and the set up was a breeze! Now I'm just a printin' fool!!

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Picked this printer up yesterday from Staples, as BestBuy didn't have any in stock. Setup was effortless and only took about 20 min. or so. Tried printing pictures on 4"x6" glossy paper to test quality, and was satisfied with the output. Documents and E-mail printing is good also. The eprint function works perfect as well as the AirPrint application for my our IPhones and the IPad 2. My only complaint is there is no way to keep 4"x6" photo paper and 8"x11" sheet paper both in the tray at the same time. So if you want to print photos you have to take out the sheet paper and put the photo paper in and vica Vera. All in all I'm fairly satisfied. Is there anything that's perfect? Not on this earth!!!

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: So, I would like to start by saying this printer appears to be one of the best looking quality images I have yet seen from inkjet printing. With that being said, I am quite disappointed in the amount of support provided with regards to scanning problems and Windows 7 / Vista. I have been unable to find a solution searching the internet, only people spending countless hours with HP, who eventually blame the issue on Microsoft. So far, I have investigated the windows services WIA and Shell Hardware Detection. Running in compatibility mode for Windows XP service pack 2 on one attempt was able to get me to scan half of the page. All attempts will go approximately 1/4 of the way through the scan, the printer makes a notification sound and then the scan stops. The preview will be wiped to a blan ... k white screen then. If you are looking to purchase this device and have big plans for the scanner you might want to second guess. I'm not about to format or dual boot to see if this even works right, but it is annoying. One other thought...scanner hardware itself does work, creates copies fine. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This is an incredible printer...easy to setup, easy to install to several computers, easy to navigate. Most importantly, I ordered it and received it at the store in the same day. This was excellent service!

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I am so very pleased with this purchase, it was easy to connect and install wireless software to print from any computer/laptop in my home. I really like the sleek look of it...not too big not too small. Thanks HP for an awesome wireless product.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Lots of features, great price
Cons: Features that don't work aren't worth having
Lots of features especially at the price. Print quality is pretty good (if a bit slow, but for home use this isn't a big problem). However, I rated it as poor value for the price because it's been a lemon from the time I bought it nearly 18 months ago.
The wireless connectivity will periodically freeze up and we can't wake the printer without literally unplugging it (power button does not respond), despite trying all the troubleshooting hints we could find online. Sometimes it will seem to be active and connected to the wireless, but we can't print to it from any computer in the house.
Most recently, it now refuses to scan from the printer when connected to a Vista desktop; it ... will scan if you open a Windows program and use the Windows-native tools. Attempts to troubleshoot this using HP's websites have failed utterly.
The fax itself also appears to have gone bad (an error message displays when we turn the machine on) and there appears no fix for this short of taking it in for service.
One annoyance, but predictable: the machine chews through ink, and the cartridges are very expensive. This is a common failing among inkjet printers but this seems to be worse than the average. I'd say the upfront money saved by going inkjet vs laser is more than made up for by the cost of the ink. It's a case of "give them the flashlight, but sell them the batteries".
All in all, a disappointing showing by our (formerly) favorite printer manufacturer. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of use, color, apps, functionality
Cons: Scanner makes pictures look foggy until contrast is changed
Upgraded due to HP Photosmart not being compatible with Windows 7 OS.
Have only had this printer a day, but love it so far. Black design looks nice. The apps on the printer allow you to have daily or weekly automated printouts at your fingertips. Apps for news, kids, crosswords, whatever you want...hopefully they will continue to add more apps. Easy to set-up, connects easily to wireless network.
Scan capability works great, but contrast for pictures (on scan menu)should be changed to 20 for the preset, otherwise pictures tend to look foggy. Once changed, the pictures look great.
Software for photo editing is online and available for download. I ... t does not come included with the installation disc, but is very easy to download.
May be putting the cart before the horse, but am concerned that this printer will not be Windows 8 compatible, as my last one (fairly new) was not Windows 7 compatible, despite the patches made available. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Have been using the HP 6500A Plus E710n printer in an office environment for about a month now. Printer is a bit slow, but for the price you shouldn't expect more. Print quality is very good for a printer at this price point. Scans and copies are of good to very good quality. When scanning documents for use in obtaining text from document the OCR software doesn't interpret smaller fonts very well. Scan of same document produces various results. Haven't tried larger fonts yet to see if issue gets better. Fax machine works well. Instructions for fax printed/web not very clear on sending faxes when special access codes are required by employer. Did figure out on my own how to do what I needed to do. Setup was fairly simple. WI-FI had dropped connects to the point I decided to go with the wire ... d option. Seemed to work OK until a period of inactivity caused the dropped connection. To be fair this could be attributed to a router setting. In all this All-In-One work good for our needs and should be a good addition to an individual or small office environment. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: I got the warranty; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Slow Operation; Large Footprint; Drinks ink poor printing
I was told this would sip ink compared to a Canon Pixma, and they were the same price, so I listened. I bought a new, real black cartridge, never opened the 1/3 filled one that comes with it. I printed a 200 page document and it use 3/4 of the cartridge. What is 3/4 of [$] plus tax for 200 pages? More cons: it takes about 7 seconds per page to dry the ink. How much is 200 pages time 7 seconds? And on best quality, there is always at least one line per page that is crunched, missing one or two dot lines, making it look like a cheap dot matrix printer. Lets recap: Slow, drinks ink, poor print quality-- Not worth all the cons just to get duplexing.

Item.Item: HP Officejet 6500A Plus e-All-in-One E710n Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
I agree with another reviewer. 6500A plus drops the wireless IP address after idle periods.
Biggest complaint is regarding ink status and warnings. The printer will warn ( once) that ink is low. Like ALL ink jet printers I have used, this warning is SEVERAL days before the ink is actually out. When I get the warning, I set out my new cartrage and WAIT for the OUT MESSAGE which NEVER comes. Now having had all four ink colors run out, there is no warning message to say out of ink. I have even checked the ink gauge but it never reports "out" -- only says "low". I have not seen an "out" message in the 2 or 3 months and now on my second set of all colors. Message to HP --- It is a real pain that there is no OUT indication until you get a printed page with stripes of a missing color. HP, ... having owned many HP printers, I am disappointed.
Only other comment is I have never got the printer to do two sided. I have selected but never worked, could be me, but if so, this feature is not very intuitive and I have no time to fish out a feature that is not easy to use.
Hits: nice speed and color. Misses: ink out warning, looses network wireless IP address expand » « collapse
